Name: Rent/Mortgage
Description: All payments to keep a roof over your head.

Name: Travel
Description: Money paid to get you from point a to point b. Eg. Fuel, Uber, Taxi Fare

Name: Food
Description: Grocery shopping, quick takeouts when it's inconvienent

Name: Entertainment
Description: Money trown down the drain to keep you happy. Subscriptions, long nights out and other experiences
